list_definition.definition: a popular word for a child or teenager

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: They’ve got three kids now, two boys and a girl
More than a hundred kids went to the disco last night
(also adjective) his kid brother (= younger brother).

list_definition.definition: the leather made from its skin
to deceive or tease, especially harmlessly

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We were kidding him about the girl who keeps ringing him up
He kidded his wife into thinking he’d forgotten her birthday
He didn’t mean that – he was only kidding!
